title: Child seat
description:
A sturdy bench seat that can be suspended in the Flex Box in two different ways serves as a child seat. Depending on its position, it will accommodate either one taller or two smaller children age seven or younger â€“ reliably protected by the five-point seat belts. And the comfortable back cushion automatically folds in when the Flex Box is closed. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using.
The Child seat option is only available in conjunction with the "Flex Box" option.
